dc_description_s: Nicaragua Remitances Census Data, 2005 is a polygon theme representing Manzanas (6th level administrative units) in Nicaragua as of 2005. This map is georeferenced to the surface of the earth and fit to World Geodetic System (1984) coordinates. Attribute data include summary results of the 2005 Nicaraguan census questions regarding whether the household is receiving remitances from emigrated family members. The documentation of these variables can be found in the "H12_Remitances" section from the accompanying code book. This dataset is part of Nicaragua 2005 Census collection.
